SYSTEM: GATE(v3-ele_and).pdf: Página 26
Jape Rule Example
• Identifying share price changing: 
• Toshiba shares closed         up               2p at 645p
JAPE RULES
Organization
Token
Token
Lookup(
majorType=change)
Money
Money
Token
Phase: Shares
Input: Token Organization Lookup Money 
Percent
Options: control = appelt
Rule:ShareChange
(
{Organization}
({Token})[0,3]
{Lookup.majorType=="change"}
({Token})[0,3]
({Money}|{Percent})
):change -->
:change.ShareChange = {rule = 
"ShareChange"}
New annotation
ShareChange(
rule = “ShareChange”)
speaker: SYSTEM
